text: it was renamed a while ago
that's it then - old versions
ta
that said, EPS is stable now
no more API changes
so is EBD
i renamed it because it gave the impression that this flag could be used to control the component from the outside (and it was true for a brief period of time) but then I decided to go all into DDAU
and I created the `publicAPI` object that is used to control the component
so this option was only used for the initial render, therefore I renamed it to `initiallyOpened` so it's very clear that it won't update, ever
<@U040MK408> updated to 0.17 but same problem
readme says option is isOpen btw
No, that a different thing
That is the value in the piblicAPI yielded to action
ah ok
gives me
I was expecting to see `Click Me` in the DOM
